description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Summer Punch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Juice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,Strawberry,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Strawberry Summer Punch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Use 20 Red Seal tea bags, tie the strings together and place them in the jug. Add in cold water and allow the tea to brew for 10 minutes.
Whilst the tea is brewing, wash & slice the strawberries, lime. Tear the mint away from the storks.
Once the tea is brewed add lemonade, and jam and stir. Remove the teabags.
Top with strawberries, limes mint and ice to serve. The Red Seal Fruit Tea range can be brewed in hot or cold water.
